text: aur hamane us (tauraat) mein unake lie likh diya tha ki jaan jaan ke baraabar hai, aankh aankh ke baraahar hai, naak naak ke baraabar hai, kaan kaan ke baraabar, daant daant ke baraabar aur sab aaghaaton ke lie isee tarah baraabar ka badala hai. to jo koee use kshama kar de to yah usake lie praayashchit hoga aur jo log us vidhaan ke anusaar faisala na karen, jise allaah ne utaara hai jo aise log atyaachaaree hai
